provider.description:
Bank of Georgia Business Plugin
You to use this integration, you will need Client ID, Client Secret and account number you want to sync (e.g. GE06BG0000000000000000).
To get Client ID and Client Secret: - Log in at https://bonline.bog.ge/ - Visit https://bonline.bog.ge/admin/api/ - Find the "API Clients" section - Click "+ ADD NEW" - Select "Client Credentials Flow" - Name it "ZenMoney Integration" - Choose yourself as Internetbank user - Enter the one-time password sent to your device - You'll receive a Client ID and Client Secret
